dmca.title: Image Copyright Holder Complains to Google
dmca.body:
From: [Private]
To: [Private]
Date: Thu, 10 Apr 2003 12:29:56 -0400
Local: Thurs, Apr 10 2003 9:29 am
Subject: Google image removal
Acknowledge: User Support Workflow User Support Auto Responses: Generic autoreply
Matched Rule: #136 DMCA image removals autoreply
Attachments:

As per notice on your website, please remove my image from google. I have filled out the information as requested below.

1. For each image you wish to have removed from our image search service, (a) provide the exact URL for the image, and (b) indicate whether that URL is owned or operated by you.

Exact URL:

www.ryze.org/pics/ zFtsLXErxeoS.jpeg [sic]

The Image is owned by me, but resides on a website operated by Ryze.com. (http://www.ryze.com)

2.  Provide information reasonably sufficient for Google to contact you (email address is preferred).

Contact information: [Private]

3.  Provide information, to the best of your ability, sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the web page that allegedly contains infringing material (email address is preferred).

Please contact administrators of: http://www.ryze.com

4.  "I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each Image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

5.  Signed:  [Private]
